title: The most spoken languages worldwide
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Languages, and Native speaker in millions in each Languages on the y axis.
Languages Chinese has the highest Native speaker in millions and Lahnda has the lowest Native speaker in millions.
The highest Languages Chinese has 1192.0 more Native speaker in millions than the lowest Languages Lahnda.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Native speaker in millions for 10 number of Languagess.
The maximum Native speaker in millions 1311.0 is found at Languages Chinese and the minimum is found at Lahnda where Languages is 119.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Languages, and Native speaker in millions in each Languages on the y axis.
Languages Chinese has the highest Native speaker in millions and Lahnda has the lowest Native speaker in millions.
The highest Languages Chinese has 1192.0 more Native speaker in millions than the lowest Languages Lahnda.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Native speaker in millions for 10 number of Languagess.
Languages Chinese has the highest Native speaker in millions and Lahnda has the lowest Native speaker in millions.
There is a difference of 1192.0 between the maximum Languages Chinese and minimum Languages Lahnda.
Languages Chinese is higher than any other Languagess with value 1311.0, followed by Spanish, and English. Down to Languages Lahnda with the lowest value 119.0.
The highest value 1311.0 at Chinese is almost 3.58 times larger than the average value 366.0.
Summing up the values of all Languagess, we get total 3660.0.
